org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker

Class RunDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.taverna.server.master.worker.RunDatabase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RunStore, RunDBSupport

    public class RunDatabase
extends Object
implements RunStore, RunDBSupport
    The main facade bean that interfaces to the database of runs.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows

      • getRun

        public TavernaRun getRun(UsernamePrincipal user,
                         Policy p,
                         String uuid)
                  throws UnknownRunException
        Description copied from interface: RunStore
        Obtain the workflow run for a given user and name.
        Specified by:
        getRun in interface RunStore
        Parameters:
        user - Who wants to do the lookup.
        p - The general policy system context.
        uuid - The handle for the run.
        Returns:
        The workflow instance run.
        Throws:
        UnknownRunException - If the lookup fails (either because it does not exist or because it is not permitted for the user by the policy).

      • listRuns

        public Map<String,TavernaRun> listRuns(UsernamePrincipal user,
                                       Policy p)
        Description copied from interface: RunStore
        List the runs that a particular user may access.
        Specified by:
        listRuns in interface RunStore
        Parameters:
        user - Who wants to do the lookup, or null if it is being done "by the system" when the full mapping should be returned.
        p - The general policy system context.
        Returns:
        A mapping from run names to run instances.

      • registerRun

        public String registerRun(TavernaRun run)
        Description copied from interface: RunStore
        Adds a workflow instance run to the store. Note that this operation is not expected to be security-checked; that is the callers' responsibility.
        Specified by:
        registerRun in interface RunStore
        Parameters:
        run - The run itself.
        Returns:
        The name of the run.

      • unregisterRun

        public void unregisterRun(String uuid)
        Description copied from interface: RunStore
        Removes a run from the store. Note that this operation is not expected to be security-checked; that is the callers' responsibility.
        Specified by:
        unregisterRun in interface RunStore
        Parameters:
        uuid - The name of the run.
